name: OntarioCountyRecycles
0:
”Alexa, open Ontario County Recycles”
”Alexa, launch Ontario County Recycles”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ontario county recycles
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Ontario County Recycles skill for Amazon Alexa is designed to help residents and businesses throughout Ontario County to Recycle Right.

To open this skill say, "Alexa, open Ontario County Recycles". You can then ask the skill for information about various things, for example

Alexa, can I recycle electronics?
Alexa, how do I recycle paint?
Alexa, how can I get a new tot or bin?
Alexa, can I recycle hazardous waste?
Alexa, play the news.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
